title: Watch Face: Minimal Wallpaper
summary: Minimal design with all of the features you need.
description: Enrich your smartwatch wearable with Osthoro's minimal watch face.  This watch face has all of the options you need and is battery efficient at the same time.  Millions of colors are available and multiple configurations are possible, all with an appealing aesthetic.  The ambient mode in Minimal Watch Face is very battery efficient to further improve efficiency.  Try Minimal Watch Face for your Android Wear smartwatch wearable today!This app is compatible with all smartwatches that run android wear.  It works well with both round and square devices.- Minimal experience- Highly battery efficient- Pick your colors- Battery efficient ambient mode- Displays the last missed call- Missed call is displayed using name or phone number- This minimal watch face has 12 and 24 hour modes.- Phone battery level indicator- Smartwatch battery level indicator- Multiple display orientations- Multiple date formats including Day of the Week, Month Date, Year- Smartwatch battery indicator can be turned on and off- The date on this watch face can be toggled on and off- Phone battery indicaotor can be turned on and off- Missed call display can be turn on and off- A clean and minimal watch face experience!Available on the following android wear devices:Moto 360 ( moto360 )Moto 360 2015 ( 42mm, 46mm )Huawei WatchLG G Watch R ( lgwr )LG G Watch W100 ( lgwg )LG Watch Urbane ( lgwu )Sony Smartwatch 3 ( sw3 )Samsung Gear LiveAsus ZenWatch ( zenwatch 1 & 2 )Fossil QTAG Heuer ConnectedMichael Kors AccessNixon The MissionPolar M600When downloading this app, be sure to have Android Wear installed.  Android Wear is needed in order to install Minimal Watch Face to your smartwatch.When downloading this app, be aware that it takes some time for the watch face to appear in your android wear application.  You can also use Settings > Resync apps found in your wear application.  The process usually takes up to 2 minutes.  Bluetooth is relatively slow so if the watch seems slow and the watch face will not load then give it more time.Visit http://www.osthoro.com for all available watchfaces or search osthoro on the play store.
descriptionHTML:
Enrich your smartwatch wearable with Osthoro's minimal watch face. This watch face has all of the options you need and is battery efficient at the same time. Millions of colors are available and multiple configurations are possible, all with an appealing aesthetic. The ambient mode in Minimal Watch Face is very battery efficient to further improve efficiency. Try Minimal Watch Face for your Android Wear smartwatch wearable today!

This app is compatible with all smartwatches that run android wear. It works well with both round and square devices.

- Minimal experience
- Highly battery efficient
- Pick your colors
- Battery efficient ambient mode
- Displays the last missed call
- Missed call is displayed using name or phone number
- This minimal watch face has 12 and 24 hour modes.
- Phone battery level indicator
- Smartwatch battery level indicator
- Multiple display orientations
- Multiple date formats including Day of the Week, Month Date, Year
- Smartwatch battery indicator can be turned on and off
- The date on this watch face can be toggled on and off
- Phone battery indicaotor can be turned on and off
- Missed call display can be turn on and off
- A clean and minimal watch face experience!

Available on the following android wear devices:

Moto 360 ( moto360 )
Moto 360 2015 ( 42mm, 46mm )
Huawei Watch
LG G Watch R ( lgwr )
LG G Watch W100 ( lgwg )
LG Watch Urbane ( lgwu )
Sony Smartwatch 3 ( sw3 )
Samsung Gear Live
Asus ZenWatch ( zenwatch 1 & 2 )
Fossil Q
TAG Heuer Connected
Michael Kors Access
Nixon The Mission
Polar M600

When downloading this app, be sure to have Android Wear installed. Android Wear is needed in order to install Minimal Watch Face to your smartwatch.

When downloading this app, be aware that it takes some time for the watch face to appear in your android wear application. You can also use Settings > Resync apps found in your wear application. The process usually takes up to 2 minutes. Bluetooth is relatively slow so if the watch seems slow and the watch face will not load then give it more time.

Visit http://www.osthoro.com for all available watchfaces or search osthoro on the play store.
comments: Great watch face Looks good, works well. Exception is that it is incorrectly reading my phones battery to display. Other than that I'm happy. Huawei watch.
Ads I understand developers need money, but three nag screens in a row is too much.  An in-app purchase to unlock functionality would be much better.
